Classes in org.apache.james.protocols.api used by org.apache.james.protocols.api
CommandHandler
          Custom command handlers must implement this interface The command handlers will be Server wide common to all the handlers, therefore the command handlers must store all the state information in the Session object
ExtensibleHandler
          Handlers extends this interface to be notified of available extensions of the given type.
LineHandler
          Implementations of this Interface will get called after a full line (terminated with \r\n) was received.
ProtocolHandlerChain
          Chain which can be used to get all Handlers for a given Class.
ProtocolSession
          Session for a protcol.
Request
          Request received from the client
Response
          Protocol response to send to the client
WiringException
          Indicates an issue prevent the successful wiring of the components composing the SMTP processor.

Classes in org.apache.james.protocols.api used by org.apache.james.protocols.smtp.core
AbstractCommandDispatcher
          Abstract base class which CommandDispatcher implementations should extend.

          Custom command handlers must implement this interface The command handlers will be Server wide common to all the handlers, therefore the command handlers must store all the state information in the Session object

          Custom connect handlers must implement this interface The connect handlers will be server-wide common to all the Handlers , therefore the handlers must store all the state information in the Session object
